sect3.title: MySQL Extension
sect3.para: The MySQL ActionScript class follows the same API as MySQL, even down to the same arguments to the same function names. This enables a Flash movie to have direct access to a MySQL database. Traditionally Flash movies have had no database support, they either had to use arrays, or use XML to communicate to an application specific external database daemon.
